properties.scriptContent:
set -e
workdir="$(pwd)"
repo_zip="$workdir/sentinel-training-demo.zip"
repo_dir="$workdir/sentinel-training-demo"
script_path="$workdir/IngestCSV.ps1"

export REPO_ZIP="$repo_zip"
export REPO_DIR="$repo_dir"

if [ ! -d "$repo_dir" ]; then
  curl -L -o "$repo_zip" "https://github.com/kapetanios55/SentinelTrainingDemo/archive/refs/heads/master.zip"
  python - <<'PY'
import zipfile, os
zip_path = os.environ.get('REPO_ZIP')
out_dir = os.environ.get('REPO_DIR')
with zipfile.ZipFile(zip_path, 'r') as zf:
    zf.extractall(out_dir)
PY
fi

root_dir="$repo_dir/SentinelTrainingDemo-master"
custom_path="$root_dir/Training/Azure-Sentinel-Training-Lab/Artifacts/Telemetry"
templates_path="$workdir/DCRTemplates"
mkdir -p "$templates_path"

curl -L -o "$script_path" "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kapetanios55/SentinelTrainingDemo/master/Training/Azure-Sentinel-Training-Lab/Artifacts/Scripts/IngestCSV.ps1"

pwsh "$script_path" -SubscriptionId "$SUBSCRIPTION_ID" -ResourceGroupName "$RESOURCE_GROUP_NAME" -Location "$LOCATION" -WorkspaceName "$WORKSPACE_NAME" -TelemetryPath "$custom_path" -TemplatesOutputPath "$templates_path" -Deploy -Ingest
